overview: “Huajun Qin is the Vice President of Engineering and Chief Architect at Mozes. Before joining Mozes, he was a Distinguished Software Engineer at ETRADE Financial. During his ten year tenure, Huajun was instrumental in developing a highly scalable, fault tolerant service oriented architecture for the company. Prior to ETRADE, he was a technical consultant for multiple clients, including Hewlett Packward and homegain.com. He also worked as Principal Engineer at IA Corporation, delivering high performance document imaging and check archive solutions for Fortune 100 companies. He earned his Ph.D. in Computer Science from State University of New York at Stony Brook, M.S. from Georgia Institute of Technology, and B.S. from Southwestern Jiaotong University in China.” (Source: Mozes)

relationships.title: Vice President of Engineering and Chief Architect
